column1: Funeral Mass will be held Thursday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 am in Church of Our Lady
column5: Mount Carmel with Father Francis Karwacki
column6: officiating. Burial will be in Our Lady of Perpetual Help Cemetery. Viewing will be held Wednesday evening from 6:00-9:00 with Vigil Prayers and the Rosary at 8:00 and Thursday morning from 9:30 - 10:30 in the C.J. Lucas Funeral Home
